title: Microsoft Edge gets a built-in grammar editor and smart web selection
content:
Microsoft has announced that it’s rolling out a couple of major new features for its Edge browser, including integration with Microsoft Editor, which was announced a few months ago. Additionally, there’s a new web select feature that makes it easy to copy content you find on the web, including tables. Microsoft Editor integration is about

The post Microsoft Edge gets a built-in grammar editor and smart web selection appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has announced a couple of new features rolling out to Microsoft Edge users, including integration with Microsoft Editor.
